data.title: Luis Aviles Felix – Hoffmann Research Group
data.text:
Guest Researcher (January – March 2023)

Researcher of the Consejo Nacional de Investigaciones Científicas y Técnicas (CONICET) from Argentina. I was postdoc at SPINTEC laboratory from Commissariat à l’énergie atomique et aux énergies alternatives (CEA) in Grenoble, France. I was also potsdoc at Magnetic Resonance Laboratory of Bariloche Atomic Center in Argentina. I received my Ph.D. in Physics in 2015 from Instituto Balseiro/Cuyo’s National University also at the Magnetic Resonance Laboratory. For my PhD studies I received a scholarship sponsored by the CONICET/Argentina. I received my degree in Physics from the Science’s Faculty of National University of Engineering in Lima, Perú.

Email: lsa@illinois.edu / lavilesf@cab.cnea.gov.ar

Academic profiles: Scopus – Orcid – LinkedIn – ResearchGate

Affiliation: Laboratorio Resonancias Magnéticas Instituto de Nanociencia y Nanotecnología (CNEA – CONICET), Nodo Bariloche, Av. Bustillo 9500, (8400) Bariloche (RN), Argentina
